des: "This is a great dip for parties.  It goes a long way and is served at room temperature so it does not have to be kept hot or cold.  I usually serve it on thin wheat crackers."
ins: Place the butter and cream cheese into a medium bowl, and beat with an electric mixer. Add the shrimp, onion, lemon juice, garlic salt and mayonnaise; beat until fluffy. Cover and chill for several hours before serving. Allow the butter to come to room temperature before serving.
